title: Soundtrack Collection
description: This is a collection of music scores that you are free to use in your project after purchase! They are all produced by Bill McCarthy and are very unique! Pump your project with epic soundtracks and give it the sound it deserves!
longDescription:
Preview: youtube.com/watch?v=q-z9WkhsWxc

In this collection all of the music is composed using a full VST orchestra with every note being composed from scratch! This is the real deal! Hollywood soundtrack quality for your game isnt always easy to find. Please note that upon purchase you may use this music in ANY way in ANY project! All that is asked is that proper credit be given in the credits of your game as follows: Name of song - Bill McCarthy. Thats all thats needed! This is your music to use and make it best fitted for your game! Use pieces, sections or the whole thing! This pack includes 50 songs!!! Get your music library fully loaded in 1 shot! Make sure to hear some of the music on Preview: billytune.com or follow me on twitter Preview: @billytune
technicalDetails:

Number of Audio Cues: 50 (same as songs)
Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAV
